#summary This is the main index of the language and standard library documentation.

= Special constructs =

Things that have syntactic sugar in the language:
 * !Number - floating point numbers (double precision)
 * !String - text strings (Unicode)
 * !List - indexed container (an immutable array)
 * !Dictionary - associative container (also called a map)
 * !Functions - lambda/anonymous functions (closures)
 * !Variables
 * !Modules

= Modules =

No modules yet.
